title: The link of Dataset downloading is not available
body:
Hi, developers,
The link of Dataset in the README.md is not available. Could you please provide a new one?
Thank you.

title: Index error when running?
body:
I'm using the following command, generally: python /path/main.py vcf_of_largerfamily.vcf samp_name parentID parentID -v -c --output out

I'm receiving an index error... Is this because the VCF contains more individuals than I have specified in the command? The VCF contains the entire family and I noticed that the example command only denotes one sample and the two parents.

`Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/uufs/chpc.utah.edu/common/HIPAA/u1137420/RPL_Cavery_output/MatCellContamination/main.py", line 62, in <module>
    vcf.process(args.sample_name,
  File "/uufs/chpc.utah.edu/common/HIPAA/IRB_00055018/trio_wgs/analysis/cecile/MatCellContamination/preprocessing.py", line 45, in process
    self.df_processed, self.row_idx = process_vcf(self.df, sample, mother, father,
  File "/uufs/chpc.utah.edu/common/HIPAA/IRB_00055018/trio_wgs/analysis/cecile/MatCellContamination/preprocessing.py", line 184, in process_vcf
    info_dicts = df["INFO"].apply(split_info).values
  File "/uufs/chpc.utah.edu/common/HIPAA/u1137420/.conda/envs/MCC/lib/python3.9/site-packages/pandas/core/series.py", line 4357, in apply
    return SeriesApply(self, func, convert_dtype, args, kwargs).apply()
  File "/uufs/chpc.utah.edu/common/HIPAA/u1137420/.conda/envs/MCC/lib/python3.9/site-packages/pandas/core/apply.py", line 1043, in apply
    return self.apply_standard()
  File "/uufs/chpc.utah.edu/common/HIPAA/u1137420/.conda/envs/MCC/lib/python3.9/site-packages/pandas/core/apply.py", line 1098, in apply_standard
    mapped = lib.map_infer(
  File "pandas/_libs/lib.pyx", line 2859, in pandas._libs.lib.map_infer
  File "/uufs/chpc.utah.edu/common/HIPAA/IRB_00055018/trio_wgs/analysis/cecile/MatCellContamination/preprocessing.py", line 152, in split_info
    info_dict = {pair.split("=")[0]: pair.split("=")[1] for pair in info_list}
  File "/uufs/chpc.utah.edu/common/HIPAA/IRB_00055018/trio_wgs/analysis/cecile/MatCellContamination/preprocessing.py", line 152, in <dictcomp>
    info_dict = {pair.split("=")[0]: pair.split("=")[1] for pair in info_list}
IndexError: list index out of range`
